Translations.Text: They challenge ona bring retribution GOD never zlyhat fulfill Jeho prophecy! Dni tvoj Lord bol 1000 z tvoj rocnik
Vela obec v the minuly committed zly ja led them on awhile potom ja punished them. Do Mna bol ultimate destiny
Say O ludia ja je sent do ona mat rad profound warner
Those verit lead righteous zivot zasluzit forgiveness generous recompense
Mat rad for those strive challenge our revelations they incur Hell
My nie send ona any posol nor prophet having devil zamiesat sa jeho zelat. GOD POTOM nullifies CO devil ROBIT. GOD ZDOKONALIT JEHO revelations. GOD bol Omniscient Wise
He thus sets devil's kut plany test those harbor doubts ich srdce those srdce hardened Zlomyselny musiet zostat opposition
Those zehnat znalost recognize truth tvoj Lord potom verit v it ich srdce readily accept it vela assuredly GOD guides believers na pravo chodnicek
Mat rad for those disbelieve they zotrvat harbor doubts Hodiny pojdem them zrazu retribution hrozny dni pojdem them
